name: Brightsign-html5-digital-clock
body:
### A digital clock suitable for use with BrightSign players.

[Demo](https://github.com/brightsign/brightsign-html5-digital-clock/blob/master/index.html#?format=format%3Dhh:mm:ss%20z%3Bcolor%3Dred%3Bsize%3D100px%3Boffsetx%3D0%3Boffsety%3D0%3Bheight%3D371px%3Bwidth%3D1200px%3Btimezone%3D420%3Balignment%3Dcenter%3Bopacity%3D0.5%3Bpath%3Ddigital-clock-face.jpeg).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
